thread.title: The Cast of This Is Us Isn't Making Us Cry For Once at the Golden Globes
thread.title_full: The Cast of This Is Us Isn't Making Us Cry For Once at the Golden Globes

author: Ryan Roschke
title: The Cast of This Is Us Isn't Making Us Cry For Once at the Golden Globes
text:
This Is Us Cast at the 2017 Golden Globes The Cast of This Is Us Isn't Making Us Cry For Once at the Golden Globes January 8, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 The Cast of This Is Us Isn't Making Us Cry For Once at the Golden Globes 
It should come as no surprise that This Is Us staged a full takeover at Sunday night's Golden Globe Awards in LA. After all, the show was one of the Fall's hottest new additions and received a handful of nominations to boot. Let's just say we're excited to see the cast all glammed up instead of breaking our hearts for once. That last thing we need right now is a cry session. Related:
